---
Test
---
This test ensures that we can click on an element with an offset.

We use a mock server running to serve the HTML defined in this page.


!define HTML { {{{
<html>
<head>
<style>
div {
    width: 200px;
    height: 100px;
    border: 1px solid black;
}
</style>
</head>
<body>

<div id="area" onclick="showCoords(event)"></div>
<p id="demo"></p>

<script>
function showCoords(event) {
    var x = event.clientX;
    var y = event.clientY;
    var coor = "X: " + x + ", Y: " + y;
    document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML = coor;
}
</script>
</body>
</html>
}}} }


|script      |mock xml server setup|
|add response|${HTML}              |
|$url=       |get mock server url  |

|script                |browser test                       |
|seconds before timeout|1                                  |
|open                  |$url                               |
|click                 |id=area |with offset x|10  |y  |50 |
|check                 |value of|id=demo      |X: 18, Y: 58|

|check                 |value of|id=demo      |X: 58, Y: 18|
